themes: perceived negative impact of recent city policies
lack of objective criteria for fairness and discrimination
need for redress mechanisms for artists
key_phrases: "Notions of 'fairness' were turned on their head post pandemic"
"ideological considerations seemed to have backfired, and done harm to the very groups it was supposed to help"
"Assessment of artistic excellence were, in some cases, overlooked altogether"
"An objective criteria needs to be established to define fair treatment"
"artists allege such treatment, and they obviously deserve a means of redress"
barriers_identified: lack of objective criteria for fairness
overlooking artistic excellence in funding decisions
absence of clear definitions for discrimination
no established means of redress for artists
solutions_proposed: establish objective criteria to define fair treatment
create a means of redress for artists alleging discrimination
